body:
### Welcome to SmartObjectParser Page
This is a GitHub page for the SmartObjectParser .NET class.
This class will allow users to effortlessly store large user-defined objects to a String (read : A file) and restore them when needed. This is all done by using already existing .NET reflection.



### Authors and Contributors
@BlackHacks
name: ObjectsSmartParser
tagline: C# reflection based smart parser that will let you save and restore any custom object and list of objects from and to a String
